profile:
Founded by Oswaldo Leon(Ozzy), is owned and operated. Contractors and companies have required his services for his skill , reputation , professionalism and leadership, has led him through some parts of Canada. Recognized for his work ethic and Roofing experience . the company began as a full service Roofing and home improvement company and more. Taking advantage of his experience and passion for his trade. With Roofing classes and certifications approved. This is the fourth generation in construction .​ ​

Oswaldo Leon his career as a Roofer and construction worker, and brought the true art of woodworking to every detail of his jobs. He found in the industry, that the while the inside of the home was given much attention, others did not give enough painstaking care to the outside of the home. This is where Leon’s Roofing & Renovations Ltd. found its niche.

At Leon’s Roofing & Renovations Ltd. brings the care and quality of true craftsmanship to the roofing industry.
services:
Roofing company. specialist in shingles. 
Re-roof, new construction.
cleaning eavestrough.
Repairs. call services.
Exteriors  (Siding,Eavestrough)
Renovations-Remodeling.
painting, windows.
junk removal.
Handyman.
brands: the best materials on the market.
name: Leon's Roofing and Renovation Ltd.

profile:
If you’re looking for help with your never ending list of odd jobs that need doing around your house look no further. We will handle your handyman needs and leave no trace but a perfectly finished project. From small fixes to complete remodels we can do it all. We do honest work and pride ourselves on reliability, integrity and quality work. We will do our best to be flexible and work around your schedule. Give us a call for all your handyman needs. We look forward to earning your business!
